transArray.content: The service the day before yesterday was particularly enthusiastic. Every time I come here, I will give you a souvenir. The room is also very clean and hygienic. There is also a robot at the front desk that delivers food, which is very good.

A word of praise is enough to make us feel grateful. Only by continuing to work hard can we live up to our expectations. Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for your review and approval of the front desk service and guest room hygiene. Your support is the greatest encouragement to our work. During the epidemic, the hotel robot waiter provides you with full contactless service to make your stay comfortable. Feel more at ease and rest assured. All hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you all the best in your work! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
